2022, updated on 8/5/2023, 1/1/2024, 30/: TINDAKMALAYSIA NETWORK SERVICES PLT (TINDAK MALAYSIA)

Penyata pilehanraya-pilehanraya umum parlimen (Dewan Ra'ayat) dan dewan-dewan negeri, tahun 1964 bagi negeri-negeri Tanah Melayu by Election Commission of Malaysia (SPR), Tindak Malaysia (2022), Federal Government Gazette 23rd April 1964 (for names and Independent Symbols), Constituency Code from The Malayan Parliamentary Election of 1964 by K.J. Ratnam & R.S Milne (1967), Coalition Politics in Malaysia (Zakiah Awang, 1983), Straits Budget 1 April 1964, Page 11, The Straits Times 27 April 1964 Page 5,  The Star, Astro Awani, Berita Harian, Today Online, National Library of Singapore, Perdana Foundation Library, Penang Travel Tips, singapore-elections.com. Refer to 1964_Other_Sources_File for more information.

There may be discrepancies for the age of candidates as there is no official data released for the attribute.There may be a presence for missing data points for age attribute for candidates. There were no elections for Sabah and Sarawak as they were under the period of indirect elections and no constituencies were formed in East Malaysia. TindakMalaysia Network Services PLT is not responsible for any errors or ommissions arising from the original data or its derivatives

Parliamentary Name (follow the sequence code of Penyata pilehanraya-pilehanraya umum parlimen (Dewan Ra'ayat) dan dewan-dewan negeri, tahun 1964 bagi negeri-negeri Tanah Melayu)
